t: What does Berlin Brands Group do?
Sell Your Amazon FBA Business | Berlin Brands Group
s: When selling your business or Amazon FBA to us, it immediately has the chance to turn over significantly more. How does it work? With our BBG platform. Immediately after the sale, we integrate your brand into our portfolio. We list it on all of our 100+ sales channels.

t: Berlin Brands Group - 2025 Company Profile, Funding, Competitors & Financials - Tracxn
s: 3 weeks ago - Berlin Brands Group is a series D company based in Berlin (Germany), founded in 2005 by Peter Chaljawski. It operates as a Brand of consumer products. Berlin Brands Group has raised $800M in funding from Ardian and Bain Capital, with a current valuation of $1.2B.
